item.title: It's hard to believe that there are so many people, regardless of their political ideology, think Ukraine started the Russo-Ukrainian War or at least ...
item.description:
It's hard to believe that there are so many people, regardless of their political ideology, think Ukraine started the Russo-Ukrainian War or at least think that Ukraine provoked Russia to attack Ukraine. Don't they read history?
